outputs.output_descr: The project seeks to strengthen capacities for regional councils and local authority by effectively capacitating local communities to identify aspects of their vulnerability in relation of HIV and AIDS. It further supports integration of community innovations into Regional council and Local Authorities' planning and budgeting processes.

project_descr: The project seeks to strengthen capacities for regional councils and local authority by effectively capacitating local communities to identify aspects of their vulnerability in relation of HIV and AIDS.
